properties.displayName: External Upstream Source Added to Azure DevOps Feed
properties.description:
The detection looks for new external sources added to an Azure DevOps feed. Incident record Actor UPN and ID, IP Address, Feed Name and ID Project Name and ID etc.
An attacker could look to add a malicious feed in order to inject malicious packages into a build pipeline.

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: New external sources has been added from {{SourceName}} to an Azure DevOps feed by {{ActorUPN}} from IP Address {{IpAddress}}. An attacker could look to add a malicious feed in order to inject malicious packages into a build pipeline.
